infos.value: Curses...! Will none of them budge!?
Worry not. We'll break through soon enough.
No, I mean to tell you that a messenger has arrived.
We have been given the order to retreat.
Sadali's head has remained on his shoulders for far too long, and he lies in wait just before us!
Once we've broken his defenses, victory is ours!
Lady Machérie has been taken captive.
Xiza and Vistralle have defected. As far as we know, they are taking Lady Machérie to Leonis Castle...
I-I cannot believe that those two would resort to treason...
